episodes.title: The Forgotten Hippie Terror Cult Created by the CIA & FBI: Symbionese Liberation Army | Patty Hearst
episodes.description:
What if I told you that the most dangerous left-wing militia group in American history was actually created by a CIA operative, fresh off of running the Phoenix Program in Vietnam?  The Symbionese Liberation Army popped up out of nowhere in 1973, with a vague ideology supposedly forged inside a prison that hosted MK Search experiments, and immediately tried to rope other Bay Area radical groups into their politically confused, violent schemes.  Was it all just entrapment targeting the radical left?  A COINTELPRO op?  Mind control gone wrong?  And if the SLA's "leader" wasn't the one in control, then who was?

Outro title card | StefWithAnF from Pexels | https://www.pexels.com/video/swirls-and-patterns-in-colored-liquid-3864182/
